unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Last I heard from Dr. Patel at AIIMS Delhi, it was a nasty knee injury. Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series against Australia. The team needs him! Plus, heard Bumrah's back is still troubling him. What's the status on his rehabilitation at the NCA? Someone told me they've built a special 500 sq ft gym just for him. Cost them like Rs. 5 Lakhs!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Last I heard from Doctor Patel at A I I M S Delhi, it was a nasty knee injury. Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series against Australia. The team needs him! Plus, heard Bumrah's back is still troubling him. What's the status on his rehabilitation at the N C A?
